label: Automatic formatting
content: Enter the contents of your resume and our smart templates will automatically format it for you. No more fiddling with margins and page breaks.

label: Easily change templates
content: Have you ever tried changing templates in Word? It's not easy. Standard Resume lets you try new templates in one click.

label: Built in best practices
content: We work with recruiters and hiring managers to help you build a resume that follows the resume rules they are looking for.
